name: A veeeery simple multiplayer game with two player servers lmao

description:
YOOOO! Look at this awesome Scratch game and whaaaat?! You can play it with YOUR FRIENDS?! Sadly u probably don't have friends :[ But if you do u can! Collect Trieangles! And thats it. lol
